passages.name: overview_chapter_1
passages.label: Chapter 1
passages.text: Chapter 1 follows Mei, a human woman who awakens in the Dimensional Trap, a mysterious underground structure. She encounters Florentina, an Alraune (plant-woman) merchant who becomes her companion. Together they explore the region of Trannadar, visiting locations like Evermoon Forest, the Beehive, Starfield Swamp, Quantir Mansion, St. Fora's, the Rubber Wilds, Slimeville, and Nix Nedar. Mei can undergo transformations into various forms (Alraune, Bee, Ghost, Gravemarker, Slime, Werecat, Wisphag, Mannequin, Rubber, Zombee). Key narrative threads include rescuing Cassandra, saving the Beehive from Zombees, exploring the Trap Dungeon, investigating the Quantir Mansion with its Countess, Florentina's tragic backstory (a former lawyer who became an Alraune to survive illness, rejected by her fiance Cathelina), encounters with NPCs like Polaris, Breanne, Nadia, Adina, Sharelock, Mycela, and the mannequin-related Victoria sequence. The chapter features a topic-based campfire dialogue system where Mei can discuss various subjects with Florentina.

passages.name: overview_chapter_2
passages.label: Chapter 2
passages.text: Chapter 2 shifts to Sanya, a rifle-wielding hunter who is the prophesied 'Hero of Legend'. She is accompanied by Izuna (a kitsune miko), Empress (an ancient conquerer), Zeke (a goat companion), and Odar (a fungoid). Set in the mountainous region of Trafal, the story begins at the Shrine of the Hero and involves exploring the Hero Plateau, Sanya's Cabin area, mines, Kitsune Village, Vuca Pass, Granvire, Mt. Sarulente, a Harpy Base, and the Westwoods. Key NPCs include Miso (a five-tailed kitsune cook who crafts items from monster ingredients), Tetra, and Sevavi. The chapter features a hunting minigame, a day/night system affecting the Hero Plateau (sky color changes), and a crafting system through Miso. Themes include prophecy, faith vs. doubt, and the nature of heroism.

passages.name: overview_chapter_5
passages.label: Chapter 5
passages.text: Chapter 5 follows Christine (initially presented as 'Chris' with a male voice, revealed as Christine). She awakens in Regulus, a sci-fi/industrial setting with cryogenics, an LRT (light rail transit) system, a Black Site, manufacturing facilities (Sprocket, Manufactory), Tellurium Mines, Regulus City, Biolabs (Alpha/Gamma/Delta/Genetics divisions), the Equinox facility, and the Serenity Observatory/Crater. Christine can transform into forms including Darkmatter, Dreamer, Doll, Golem, Electrosprite, LatexDrone, Raibie, Raiju, SteamDroid, Wiregirl, and Secrebot. Key companions include Tiffany (code-named '55') and SX399. The chapter features an intercom system, a tram transit system, and Sophie as a dialogue NPC. Topics shift when reaching the Biolabs area. The setting represents a dramatic genre shift from fantasy to science fiction.

passages.name: overview_chapter_0
passages.label: Chapter 0
passages.text: Chapter 0 contains shared combat and system handlers (Combat Handler, Item Node Result Check, Random Chest Override). It serves as the system backbone rather than a narrative chapter, providing combat resolution logic used across all chapters.

passages.name: overview_chapter_h
passages.label: Chapter H
passages.text: Chapter H appears to be a special/bonus chapter (possibly 'Halloween' or 'Hidden') with its own complete infrastructure: Audio, Classes, Combat, CostumeHandlers, Datafiles, Events (with Aura-based systems: All Aura, Doll Aura, Hypno Aura, Slime Aura), Field Abilities, Fonts, FormHandlers, Items, Journal, Maps, Scenes (including Bad Ends and Dungeon Complete sequences), and Topics. Its event system uses floor-based progression with aura gates and boss encounters.

passages.name: overview_chapter_3_unreleased
passages.label: Chapter 3 (Unreleased)
passages.text: Chapter 3 features Jeanne as the protagonist. It is marked as 'not available in the current build', indicating it is planned but not yet implemented.

passages.name: overview_chapter_4_unreleased
passages.label: Chapter 4 (Unreleased)
passages.text: Chapter 4 features Lotta as the protagonist. It is also marked as 'not available in the current build'.

Mei: But, what about the honey? The bees?
Florentina: With the source of corruption gone, I'm sure the bees can take care of the rest.
Mei: Hm, what if they don't know how? What if they don't know how to fix this?

passages.name: chapter_1_sc_beehivebasement_fightboss_scene_begin
passages.label: Beehive Basement Fight Boss
passages.text:
Florentina: Hey look, Mei! A dead cultist!
Cultist: !
Florentina: Has nobody informed you? Allow me to be the first.
Florentina: You're dead. C'mere.
Cultist: Drone, silence this Alraune interloper! How did you allow her into the sanctum?
Cultist: ...
Cultist: Drone?

passages.name: chapter_1_sc_victory_posttransition_victory_posttransition
passages.label: Victory Post Transition (Victory_PostTransition)
passages.text:
Mei: There. Have at her, bees!
Florentina: Heh. They'll turn her into a bee, and then use her knowledge to purify the hive. Good thinking.
Mei: It's only fair.
Mei: Besides, now she'll have a family to love her and care for her. All will be forgiven.
Florentina: Whatever.

passages.name: chapter_1_sc_beehivebasement_florentina_scene_begin
passages.label: Beehive Basement Florentina
passages.text:
Mei: All right, let's rumble!
Mei: ...
Florentina: What happened? You bees forget how to fight?
Florentina: Let's give them a refresher course.
Mei: No, wait. I think something is going on here.
*The bee seems to be preoccupied. It keeps looking over its shoulder as it tries to block you*

passages.name: chapter_1_sc_beehivebasement_florentinaround2_scene_begin
passages.label: Beehive Basement Florentina Round2
passages.text:
Mei: Still not letting me through, huh?
Florentina: What happened? You bees forget how to fight?
Florentina: Let's give them a refresher course.
Mei: Relax, will you? They were like this earlier. There's something going on here.
*The bee seems to be preoccupied. It keeps looking over its sho...

passages.label: Empress — Campfire
passages.text:
Empress: Sanya, we do not have time for idle chit chat. Izuna is our current concern. Let us go.
Empress: Do you need guidance?

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_izuna_campfire
passages.label: Izuna — Campfire
passages.text: Izuna: Need some guidance, sweetheart?

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_miso_hello
passages.label: Miso — Hello
passages.text:
Izuna: Miso! It's great to see you!
Miso: Well well, if it isn't Izuna. I knew you weren't dead.
Sanya: You're sounding awfully blase about this.
Miso: The Fox Goddess protects her followers. I knew you'd turn up sooner or later.
Miso: Which is not to say I didn't look. We sent out search pa...

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_miso_pamphlet_bandits_in_westwoods
passages.label: Miso — Pamphlet Bandits in Westwoods
passages.text:
Miso: Bandits in Westwoods. If you're even half right, Izuna, these are dark times.
Miso: In my years as a warrior, I never saw anyone so desperate that they'd try to jump merchants in Westwoods. It's just too dangerous.
Izuna: Thanks for reading it, Miso.
Izuna: But it's definitely true. I've...

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_miso_pamphlet_bun_runners
passages.label: Miso — Pamphlet Bun Runners
passages.text:
Miso: Bunnies with a male harem, huh. I've been on the road a lot and never seen that before.
Miso: Bunnies, yes. Smuggling, yes. Harems, absolutely. But monsterboys? Learn something new every day.
Izuna: That's quite a thing to hear from you, Miso. I thought you'd seen everything.

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_miso_pamphlet_dragon
passages.label: Miso — Pamphlet Dragon
passages.text:
Miso: Hah! Thanks for the refresher. Thought you retired, Empress.
Empress: I suppose I had, but the road called.
Izuna: You know her, Miso?
Miso: I know *of* her. I believe elder Yukina was friends with her way back in the day, before my time.
Empress: I do try to keep up with the kitsunes....

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_miso_pamphlet_green_westwoods
passages.label: Miso — Pamphlet Green Westwoods
passages.text:
Miso: A covenant of alraunes in Westwoods, trying to heal the scarred land. Amazing. I should head over there.
Miso: If nothing else, maybe they'll grow some particularly spicy foods. Uh, I might need a spell to check for toxins.
Sanya: Oh yeah, nothing tastier than heavy metal toxicity!

passages.name: chapter_2_dlg_tetra_hello
passages.label: Tetra — Hello
passages.text: Tetra: Hi there! There will be more dialogue next version when the tunnel is cleared.

passages.text: Zeke: Bahh?

Sanya: I'm totally helpless, you could do anything you wanted to me...
Bunny: Oh ho, anything?
Sanya: Anything at all! You might touch me, strip me naked!
Sanya: Even transform me into a bunny, just like you!
Bunny: Well why don't you start by emptying your wall...

passages.name: chapter_2_sc_defeat_sevavi_scene_begin
passages.label: Defeat Sevavi
passages.text:
Two statue women gripped Sanya firmly by the arms and dragged her out of the room, towards a gallery of empty pedestals. Her head spun, her vision was blurred.
They seemed to have arrived. One of the statues hefted her and placed her in a standing position on a pedestal, the ones she had walked pa...

passages.label: Defeat (Scene_PostTransition)
passages.text:
Sanya: ... Like falling off a bicycle!
Sanya: Everyone's skin still attached?
Izuna: Skin, bones, cartilage. Everything is here!
Zeke: Baaa!
Sanya: Beginner's luck! We'll get 'em next time!
Zeke: NYEH!
Izuna: Zeke thirsts for blood!
Sanya: The seas shall run red with the blood of his e...

passages.name: chapter_2_sc_bunny_scene_begin
passages.label: Bunny
passages.text: Sanya leaned against the cool wood desk. Her clothes lay crumpled in a pile against the wall, and the cool air of the caves enveloped her naked body. Angel stood before her, still fully dressed, though the voluminous tufts of fur that rose from the top of her vest whispered of what lay hidden beneat...

passages.name: chapter_2_sc_harpy_scene_begin
passages.label: Harpy
passages.text:
Warm. That was the feeling that wrapped around Sanya as her mind drifted back to her senses. More than an enveloping feeling, it embraced her like a gentle emotion. Warm and warmth.
She was unable to open her eyes. Or perhaps she had, and her surroundings were simply too dark to see the difference...

passages.name: chapter_2_sc_harpyfeet_scene_begin
passages.label: Harpy Feet
passages.text: Sanya gasped as her consciousness returned, dizziness and confusion still plagued her mind as she struggled to come to grips with her surroundings. Her ears were ringing and her limbs were heavy and weak, but from the startled movements of her rousing, she could still tell that she was encased in a ...

passages.label: Sevavi
passages.text:
Sanya delicately placed the fox girl on the ground nearby, being careful not to bend or twist her in any way. She stepped placidly on the pedestal and struck a pose. Her thoughts clouded over and she had a feeling of serenity.
As she stood there, holding a pose, she began to think of all the ways ...

'This one? Looks like a normal pedestal to me.' Izuna said. Sanya stepped on the pedestal and struck a pose, with a serene smile on her face.
'Sit back and enjoy the show,' Sanya replied. Izuna shrugged, having a pretty good idea of what was about to happen. She instead settled for patting Zeke to...

passages.text:

Mei: (But, I have to keep going. Got to find a way home!)
Mei: (Then I can join my very own leaf-sisters on Earth! Lord knows the environment could use some tending...)
Mei: Mmmmm...
Florentina: Were you spacing out or something?

Chris: *cough* who are you?
Voice: That's not relevant, but I am within normal cognitive parameters. Your concern is noted.
Voice: I observed you in the airlock on the thermal sensors. The optical camera feed has been cut for that area. Ar...

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_sophie_campfire
passages.label: Sophie — Campfire
passages.text:
Christine: Dearest, you look like you have something to say.
Sophie: Me? No, I couldn't. I don't want to interrupt.
Christine: Balderdash! This is a rest stop, let's pass the time.
Sophie: All right! What do you want to talk about?

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_sx399_campfire
passages.label: SX399 — Campfire
passages.text:
SX-399: Christine, is it a bad time to ask you for some advice?
Christine: Never a bad time, my dear! What can I help you with?

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_sx399_plan
passages.label: SX399 — Plan
passages.text:
SX-399: Hey 55! Do you like my hair? I was just... fiddling with it, you know?
55: It looks... red.
Christine: Smooth, 55.
Christine: Listen, SX-399...
SX-399: I don't like this at all. You're doing that thing where you have bad news.
Christine: Your condition... It's not good.

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_sx399_root
passages.label: SX399 — Root
passages.text:
SX-399: *Are you sure this will work?*
Christine: *Be polite but assertive. She needs to respect your independence.*
SX-399: Hey Christine - and hello to you, ma'am.
55: *Now would be the ideal time to kidnap her.*
Christine: 55, for the last time we are not kidnapping her!

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_tiffany_campfire
passages.label: Tiffany — Campfire
passages.text: 55: Hold here, Christine. Let's exchange information before we move on.

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_tram_root
passages.label: Tram — Root
passages.text:
(The tram is out of service and will be redirected soon. I should see if there's another way to Sector 99.)
(We should go ask around the shops and try to find some dressmaking materials before we leave.)
(No going back. We have a job to do.)
(I had better get Christine to the repair bay!)

passages.name: chapter_5_dlg_tram_tram_function
passages.label: Tram — Tram Function
passages.text:
55: Please proceed to Sector 254 without me. I will be in touch.
55: If you are going to Sector 254, I will take another tram. Be alert.
Christine: PDU, please contact 55 and tell her to meet me at switching station R-21.
PDU: Affirmative. 55 has replied she is on her way.

Christine frowned. She wondered what she was going to do with the electrical disturbance now that she had trapped it in the broken console. What was it? Was it a voidborne partirhuman, perhaps? Or maybe an AI? She wasn't sure, but it wouldn't be causing any more trouble.

As Christine stepped in, her mind started to race. What if something goes wrong? T...

She pulled her eyes from Sophie's beaming face as she looked around at the PDUs, six in total, that were all pointed ...

Odess spoke to her softly, making a cooing sound, as if speaking to a baby. She produced a pressurized can and sprayed it in t...

SX-399 has led her to a long-disused workshop on a higher floor of the mines. She had asked her friends to wait outside, and SX-399 has smiled and told her she would be ready to answer any questions that came up.

passages.label: Cassandra To Golem
passages.text: Cassandra gasped as Christine pressed a hand against her chest. The coldness of the metal seeped through her shirt and into her skin, drawing a startled gasp from Cassandra. The hand lingered there as a wry smile played across Christine's lips, while Cassandra's seemed to fumble in silent confusion.

Christine: Unit 300910! It's been too long! How are my Darkmatter friends at the observatory?

passages.label: Scene 0 Access Point (Scene 0 Access Point)
passages.text:
55: We're here.
Christine: We - are?
55: The schematics indicate that terminals in this area should have direct access to the data core.
55: ... It's quiet in here, isn't it?
Christine: Where are all the drones?
55: Hopefully, someplace far away.
55: ... Yes, this terminal will do.

passages.name: chapter_5_sc_scene_1_2856_hallway_scene_1_2856_hallway
passages.label: Scene 1 2856 Hallway (Scene 1 2856 Hallway)
passages.text:
Christine: (Hmm, it was getting closer, and now I can't hear it at all. Maybe they stopped? Perhaps I should call out to them...)
Christine: Hello? Is anyone there?
Christine: Oh, there you are. Did you hear the singing, too?
55: There are no humans assigned to this facility, and you lack a se...

passages.name: chapter_5_sc_scene_2_closet_scene_2_closet
passages.label: Scene 2 Closet (Scene 2 Closet)
passages.text:
Christine: So, you've led me into a storage closet? Just what is going on here?
55: You need to ignore that singing you hear. Forget it entirely.
Christine: That's going to be difficult.
55: To take your mind off it... perhaps you could answer a few questions for me?
Christine: Well this is ...

passages.name: chapter_5_sc_scene_3_wrecked_scene_3_wrecked
passages.label: Scene 3 Wrecked (Scene 3 Wrecked)
passages.text:
Christine: That smashing we heard... what could have done all this in a few seconds?
55: I picked up a series of radio transmissions. They were alternating, some from the west, some from the east.
55: Then, they abruptly starting moving towards my position, and I realized you had wandered off.

passages.name: chapter_5_sc_scene_4_after_boss_scene_4_after_boss
passages.label: Scene 4 After Boss (Scene 4 After Boss)
passages.text:
55: ...
Christine: 55? You should be clear to check your log files.
55: I'm searching for anything related to Project Vivify we may have missed...
Christine: Don't you believe me? She said she'd leave us alone.
55: ...
Christine: 55? Let the PDU do that. Come on.
55: ...

passages.name: chapter_5_sc_post_tiffany_meeting_scene_begin
passages.label: Post Tiffany Meeting
passages.text:
Sophie: Come along, it's all right.
Christine: I feel awful for worrying you like this. I'm fine, really.
Sophie: You've got something on your mind, don't you? It's pretty obvious.
Christine: ...
Sophie: I'm sorry. It's none of my business. Good night.
Christine: ... Wait.

passages.name: chapter_5_sc_post_tiffany_meeting_scene_posttransition
passages.label: Post Tiffany Meeting (Scene_PostTransition)
passages.text:
Christine: Sophie? Were you waiting for me?
Sophie: Oh, I was just about to come up and check on you.
Christine: Whatever for?
Sophie: You've been defragmenting for sixteen hours. I got a little worried.
Christine: Well... I had a lot of things I needed to work through...

Yes, my lady.

Beth: Thank you for understanding, my lady.

passages.name: chapter_h_sc_defeat_slimed_scene_begin
passages.label: Defeat Slimed
passages.text:
Throbbing, sliding, dripping, she moved. Her face was gone. Her name was gone. There was nothing left of the old human except a vague form.
Her thoughts were only of her Queen, obedience, and of finding more humans. Taking them, sliming them, making them like her...
Yes, she would make many more...

passages.text:
Lore: Are you two all right?
Beth: That was a lot of dolls, how did you do that?
Lore: Sigil of Flame. I used my last one just now, unfortunately.
Chris: I'm glad you're all right, Lore.
Lore: Oh, it's you.
Lore: ...
Lore: Glad you made it out of the carnival.
Chris: Barely. That charm...

passages.label: Deep Forests (Deep Forests)
passages.text:
Chris: Another witch lair down.
Beth: I didn't think that big thing was ever going to die!
Chris: Guess we should go tell Dahlia the good news.
Beth: I didn't think that big thing was ever going to die!
Lore: Hrmph.
Beth: What's got you in such a mood?
Lore: ... Nothing. It's fine.

passages.text:

Dahlia: You can't - kill me. I am - immortal. I am -
Lore: Just die already you hateful little gremlin.
Dahlia: I'll - see you in - hell! I'll be... waiting...
(Dahlia collapsed...)
Lore: It's over. I think.
Beth: I - I'm - Lore, I'm sorry. I fell f...

Chris: Easy now. Do you remember anything?
Beth: It's a blur. I remember running, and then we were in this forest, and, something snared my leg.
Beth: I tried to fight it off with a tennis racket, and then I just... I got so angry. I...

passages.text:

Angelface: Am I givin' an interview now?
Izuna: ... Not if you don't want to.
Angelface: It's funny. Nobody ever asked me a question like that. Maybe the appeal is obvious?
Angelface: They're my boys. All of 'em. Yo...

Sanya: Featherbrains!?
Angelface: Yes, that is what I said. Are you going to do something about it?
Sanya: Your feet pads look dumb!
Angelface: Probably.
Sanya: Damn it! React by getting sad! Take offense!
Angelface: No.

passages.text:

Sanya: Is it a complex process?
Esmerelda: No, well, you'll see. Just wait outside.
Izuna: I hope it's fun, sweetie!
Empress: I am sure it will be enjoyable.
Zeke: Nyeh.

passages.name: topic_florentina_past
passages.label: Florentina: Past
passages.text:
Mei: So, would you say you know me well enough to talk about your past, yet?
Florentina: It's a really long story. Do you really want to hear it?
Mei: I really do, Florentina. Please.
Florentina: Are you ever going to just give up?
Florentina: Oh wait, no. No you're not.

passages.name: topic_florentina_rochea
passages.label: Florentina: Rochea
passages.text:
Mei: Do you know who Rochea is?
Florentina: How do you know that name?
Mei: Well, you see...
Mei: I'm an Alraune too.
Florentina: You are? No, let me guess. The runestone?
Mei: Yep. I don't think you've seen me that way, yet.
Florentina: Feh. I'm not in a position to doubt any claim you ...

passages.name: topic_miso_enhancements
passages.label: Miso: Enhancements
passages.text:
Miso: Hey, Sanya? Could I ask you a favour?
Sanya: Sure.
Miso: My equipment is a little crude, as you can see. Tools wear out, and I haven't gotten around to replacing my gear.
Miso: If you could find me the right tools, I can probably make more advanced equipment for you.
Sanya: Such as?

passages.name: topic_miso_explanation
passages.label: Miso: Explanation
passages.text:
Sanya: Miso, can you give me a once-over on unlocking items?
Miso: Certainly! In fact, it's very simple.
Miso: The glacier has many unique creatures and items. I can use a bit of magic, alchemy, and good old know-how to make special items.
Miso: Just ask me about 'Unlocking' and I can show you...

passages.name: topic_miso_goodbye
passages.label: Miso: Goodbye
passages.text: Miso: Take care out there!

passages.name: topic_miso_shop
passages.label: Miso: Shop
passages.text: Miso: Here's what I have available. All proceeds go to the temple, of course!

passages.name: topic_miso_unlocking
passages.label: Miso: Unlocking
passages.text: Miso: Here are the things I can make, if you get me the materials.

passages.name: topic_mycela_business_offer
passages.label: Mycela: Business Offer
passages.text:
Florentina: A friend of yours has a business offer for me, eh? I am intrigued. What could a mushraune offer me?
Mycela: He is not a mushraune.
Florentina: My shock is only exceeded by my curiosity. A human?
Mycela: A mushroom.
Florentina: I now don't like where this is going.

passages.name: topic_mycela_future_plans
passages.label: Mycela: Future Plans
passages.text:
Mei: Mycela, what are you going to do from here?
Mycela: I - haven't even thought that far ahead. What do you think I should do?
Mycela: Rochea has been very nice to me, and I have much to learn. But the fungus who did this to me and the other mushraunes, the one we called our great leader.

passages.name: topic_mycela_goodbye
passages.label: Mycela: Goodbye
passages.text: Mycela: Be careful on the road, my friends.

passages.name: topic_mycela_mushraunes
passages.label: Mycela: Mushraunes
passages.text:
Mei: Tell me about the coven of mushraunes, from the beginning.
Mycela: All right. My first memory was waking up near that pool you found me at.
Mei: Were you an alraune?
Mycela: Yes, but I do not know if I have been for a long time or not. I don't remember anything...
Florentina: Maybe they...

passages.name: topic_polaris_polaris_lockedruins
passages.label: Polaris: Polaris_LockedRuins
passages.text:
Mei: Miss Polaris, the ruins south of here has a locked gate I can't get past. Do you know anything about it?
Polaris: Locked gate? Oh, I think I know which one you're talking about.
Polaris: Those old ruins are real deathtraps. The gate probably fell into place, it was open last I saw it.

passages.name: topic_zeke_goodbye
passages.label: Zeke: Goodbye
passages.text: Zeke: Bah.

passages.name: resting_chapter_1
passages.label: Resting: Chapter 1
passages.text:
Mei: ...
Mei: ...
Florentina: Hey, Mei!
Mei: Huh?
Florentina: Back there in the bee hive. Why'd you eat the honey?
Mei: I just - I don't know. Something came over me.
Mei: I wanted it more than anything else, ever. If you'd tried to keep me from it - I'd have struck you...

passages.name: resting_chapter_2
passages.label: Resting: Chapter 2
passages.text:
Izuna: Sanya? Are you feeling all right?
Sanya: Never felt better. Why do you ask?
Izuna: You're looking a little pale. Let me check your forehead...
Izuna: No fever. Hmm...
Empress: Anemia. You were bleeding earlier. You may have lost too much blood.
Izuna: No, I don't think so. No feelin...

passages.name: system_transformation
passages.label: Transformation
passages.text: Characters can transform between multiple forms, affecting gameplay and dialogue

passages.name: system_campfire_topics
passages.label: Campfire Topics
passages.text: At save points, players can engage in topic-based conversations with party members and NPCs

passages.name: system_new_chapter_plus
passages.label: New Chapter Plus
passages.text: Completed chapters can be replayed with NC+, keeping forms, inventory, and levels

passages.name: system_scene_reliving
passages.label: Scene Reliving
passages.text: Players can relive previously viewed cutscenes from the save menu

passages.name: system_costumes
passages.label: Costumes
passages.text: Characters have costume variants for their different forms

passages.name: system_combat
passages.label: Combat
passages.text: Turn-based combat with party members, paragons (elite enemies), and field abilities

passages.name: system_hunting
passages.label: Hunting
passages.text: Chapter 2 features a hunting minigame

passages.name: system_crafting
passages.label: Crafting
passages.text: Miso (Chapter 2) crafts items from monster ingredients

passages.name: system_decisions
passages.label: Decisions
passages.text: Dialogue branches with player choices affecting narrative outcomes

passages.name: system_variable_tracking
passages.label: Variable Tracking
passages.text: Extensive variable system tracks player decisions, quest states, and NPC relationships

passages.name: thematic_elements
passages.label: Thematic Elements
passages.text:
- Transformation and identity - protagonists undergo physical transformations
- Acceptance and prejudice - characters face rejection for their transformed states
- Love and sacrifice - Florentina's backstory of choosing survival over death
- Faith and skepticism - Chapter 2's exploration of prophecy and the 'Hero of Legend'
- Science vs. magic - Chapter 5's sci-fi setting contrasts with Chapters 1-2's fantasy
- Companionship - campfire dialogues build deep character relationships
- Loss and moving on - multiple characters deal with past trauma
- Non-linear storytelling - chapters can be played independently with different protagonists
